title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - What’s new in fullstack AWS app development (DVT204)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS全栈应用开发新功能 (DVT204)
abstract: Web developers need to deliver differentiating experiences to more users faster than ever before. To build secure, reliable, and scalable applications at 10x speed requires solutions that empower developers to get started easily, ship quickly, and iterate rapidly. In this breakout, we'll share exciting updates on how AWS Amplify is evolving to meet the needs of modern 10x web developers.
abstract_cn: Web 开发人员需要以前所未有的速度向更多用户提供差异化体验。要以 10 倍速度构建安全、可靠且可扩展的应用程序，需要能够让开发人员轻松入门、快速交付和快速迭代的解决方案。在本分会场中，我们将分享 AWS Amplify 如何演进以满足现代 10 倍速 Web 开发人员需求的激动人心的更新。
